LanguageData.AttackAllyOrNeutral: Do you really want to attack a neutral/allied faction? If you start the attack, the faction will become immediately hostile to yours!
LanguageData.AttackOwnFaction: Do you really want to attack your own home? Don't forget you can still set new coordinates at the terminal.
LanguageData.TimeUntilNextAttackLaunch: Time until next attack can be launched: {0}h
LanguageData.TimeUntilSatelliteInRange: Time until satellite is in range: {0}h
LanguageData.CannotPlaceBecauseBuildingExistsOnMap: There is already one infestation spawner on the map!
LanguageData.CannotPlaceBecauseBlueprintExistsOnMap: There is already a blueprint of the infestation spawner on the map!
LanguageData.SatelliteOutOfRange: The satellite is currently out of range!
LanguageData.AttackSpamProtection: You cant start an attack now! The satellite has a built-in spam protection.
